== Kottanellur (627907) ==

Kottanellur is a village in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 1134 hectares and harbouring 2916 households with total population of 11133 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Irinjalakuda]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 5182 and female population is 5951. Scheduled Caste Population is 1396 and Scheduled Tribes population is 13. Census Location Code of the village is 627907<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
